blogs.title: Why JavaScript?
blogs.author: John Doe
blogs.paragraph: JavaScript is a programming language, and like most programming languages, it has some basic constructs that weâ€™ll look at. A program in JavaScript is like a sequence of steps. Similar to how we give directions to a stranger, a computer needs detailed instructions, defined as steps, to accomplish any simple or complex action.

blogs.title: Understanding Life
blogs.author: Unknown Person
blogs.paragraph: Life, for me, is like a tree that gives birth to another from the seed former reaps. Focus on the things that are happening well in our life for the world is never going to say the good things about us and we need to be super positive from inside, motivating ourselves all the time from within.

blogs.title: React
blogs.author: React.com
blogs.paragraph: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs. Design simple views for each state in your application, and React will efficiently update and render just the right components when your data changes.

blogs.title: Redux
blogs.author: Redux.con
blogs.paragraph: Redux helps you write applications that behave consistently, run in different environments (client, server, and native), and are easy to test.
